TopicTitle: How do you post a spacecraft file ?

Articles.Content:
i'm new in the forums (not in KSP... i'v been playing for over a year) and i can't figure out how to attach a file in a thread.

any ideas ?

thanks ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

-Shawn.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-14T14:37:53Z" title="05/14/2015 02:37  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 14, 2015</time> by Shawn28**
[Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com) is used quite a bit. I don't think you can directly attach a file to a thread without some sort of hosting.

Not a problem! Go open yourself an account at [DropBox](https://www.dropbox.com/) or other such site (it's free). Then you can upload your craft file and post the link to it in your thread. For images, use [Imgur](http://imgur.com/) or another such site.
Google drive also works, if you prefer it.

Thanks guys ! i would try drop box and maybe google drive.

happy explosions !

-Shawn.
